name: Guts & Gory
description:
Guts and Gory!

These creatures are from a non-reality dimension. They are only real when you can see them.

Important note: A lot of feedback from players seems to indicate the camera controls are misunderstood. This is a twin-stick shooter. You do not control the camera. You control the direction the character is facing. The camera will slowly move behind you to face the same direction, IF you are moving. Enjoy!

For best experience, use a gamepad/controller! Controls:  Objective: Find and destroy the 4 "Degenerators" in the facility. Credits:
